name: Martian Mayhem!
description:
Survive the cold surface of Mars itself in this new short & sweet sandbox.

Play as Dott, an cube astronaut who's crash-landed on Mars. In order to repair their ship, they'll have to explore mars to gather materials to recreate the broken parts.

Update 1.1 Info

-Revamped World Bottom with Molten Stone and Molten Gems.

-New Molten Brick

-You can now only switch to a block you have at least one of.

-New Anvil and Furnace blocks (Not useful yet, just for decoration purposes for now)

Cheats and stuff

-Hold in space while clicking the first screen to skip the cutscene sequence and jump into the game.

-Press 1 and 0 simultaneously to enable flying and passing through blocks, press the same combination to disable (Warning: May break the game)

-Hold in any number from 1 to 8 and press Q to get a huge amount of any uncraftable resource.

-Hold in P to disable the cursor limit.
